title: game crash
body: so there i was taking the nexus when all i of sudden i get atempting to reconnect for 3 min, no dice i exit game and try to reconnect, again no dice.I close client and try to restart  Holy crap now i cant log in. I guess i just lost a promo game that i had won  cause of this but why the hell cant i log on it acts like the server aint there.

replies.body: It sounds like your network had a hiccup, maybe with your ISP or something else.  This isn't necessarily a crash unless you had a bugsplat or error message, and more of a disconnection.  We can get a better picture of what happened by running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader). Let me know if you still have any issues!
well y the time i got this posted  cause  oards didnt work either i have finaly been able to log in  and good news i didnt lose  thank god. Dont get it though its like i was ddos'ed or something
